quote: Listen to me, kid. It don’t matter what happens. It don’t matter what anybody thinks or does. All that matters is that you keep fightin’ and never, you hear me? never give up.
quote_letters: LISTEN TO ME KID IT DONT MATTER WHAT HAPPENS IT DONT MATTER WHAT ANYBODY THINKS OR DOES ALL THAT MATTERS IS THAT YOU KEEP FIGHTIN AND NEVER YOU HEAR ME NEVER GIVE UP
